code: export var TOKEN_KEY="token-key";export var USER_ID="user-id";export var isAuthenticated=function isAuthenticated(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY)!==null;};export var getToken=function getToken(){return localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY);};export var getUserId=function getUserId(){return localStorage.getItem(USER_ID);};export var login=function login(token){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);};export var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);localStorage.removeItem(USER_ID);};export var userId=function userId(id){localStorage.setItem(USER_ID,id);};
